message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,200,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $900,000.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is substantial. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,100,000.  This is my final offer, as I do have other interested parties.

Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer carefully. While I understand the value of the product, I am still aiming to keep within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,050,000.
